name: Ball Royale
description:
This game is inspired by the battle royale craze and the recent football world cup event (2018). I thought mixing both could end up in something strange but interesting, so here it is...

Most of the usual stuff of a BR game is here:
 - blue circle of death
 - looting items from the ground (not exactly)
 - airdrops

Installation
Unzip the file anywhere you want and run ballroyale.exe

Controls
keyboard:
up, down, left, right - move
space - kick (hold for extra targeting)
c - tackle / release ball
v - walk

controller (xbox):
left stick or dpad - move
x - kick
a - tackle / release ball
b - walk

Use of a controller is strongly recommended and feedback is very much appreciated
